metadata.title: Omega Shaving Brush # 90018 Syntex 100% Synthetic

categorization.explanation: The product is a shaving brush, which is typically used by men for shaving purposes. Therefore, it fits best under the 'Men's' subcategory of 'Shave & Hair Removal' in the 'Beauty & Personal Care' main category.
